title: Exercise and Health Gerontology
description: Special fitness, exercise, and health needs of elder adults. Theories of aging and age-related changes. Health and physical activity programs for elder adults. 3 lectures, 1 activity.
prerequisites: KINE 250, KINE 255 or KINE 260; and KINE 227, KINE 228, KINE 231 (formerly KINE 220) or KINE 311 (formerly KINE 219)
